2004 - 124: The Republicans left town before Labor Day, and most of those who came to protest them and were arrested have been released.
2004 - 128: A Brooklyn man was shot and killed by an off-duty police officer last night in what appeared to be an accident, the police said.
2004 - 154: A judge rejected a request yesterday by a man convicted of murdering his parents to remove the Suffolk County district attorney from a review of his case.
